page.title: 05Wooler - industry
page.content: There is very little industry in Wooler.Most factories are small and employ few people.Veevers are agric- ultural engineers and joiners.They have a workshop on Brewery Lane.Red- paths specialise in transporting livestock.They have a large fleet of wagons and lorries and employ 43 peop- le.Both these are family run busine- sses. Maxway employ mostly women to pluck, wash,prepare,cook and pack chickens.A few men are employed as managers and supervisors. There is a small industrial estate on the site of the old station yard. Here people have set up small busine- sses making furniture,dealing in waste paper etc. but employ few people.
